p: Computed tomography (CT) showed no evidence of metastatic lesion in the brain, lung, liver and bone. Given the comorbidities of right axillary adenopathy and left chest wall metastases, the patient received chemotherapy. Because of financial difficulties, paclitaxel liposome and trastuzumab were administered in the patient. At the follow-up, the patient was alive at 19 months post-thyroid metastases diagnosis. Assessment by CT did not reveal any new distant metastases.
